update activity set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video = #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, feature = #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contain_people = #{containPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, preferential_price = #{preferentialPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, original_price = #{originalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_time = #{activityTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, minu_people = #{minuPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address_name = #{addressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, favourable = #{favourable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify = #{classify,jdbcType=INTEGER}, arrive_time = #{arriveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, category = #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, copies = #{copies,jdbcType=INTEGER}, arrive_copies = #{arriveCopies,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select a.id ,a.copies,a.arrive_copies as arriveCopies,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.title,a.picture,a.contain_people as containPeople,a.preferential_price as preferentialPrice,a.original_price as originalPrice,a.address , e.name as enterpriceName from activity a left join enterprise e on a.enterprise_id = e.id where 1=1 and a.state=1 and a.activity_time >now() and a.copies != a.arrive_copies
limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from activity a left join enterprise e on a.enterprise_id = e.id where 1=1 and a.state=1 and a.activity_time >now() and a.copies != a.arrive_copies

select a.id ,a.copies,a.arrive_copies as arriveCopies,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.title,a.picture,a.contain_people as containPeople,a.preferential_price as preferentialPrice,a.original_price as originalPrice,a.address , e.name as enterpriceName from activity a left join enterprise e on a.enterprise_id = e.id where 1=1 and category>3 and a.state=1 and a.activity_time >now() and a.copies != a.arrive_copies
limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from activity a left join enterprise e on a.enterprise_id = e.id where 1=1 and category>3 and a.state=1 and a.activity_time >now() and a.copies != a.arrive_copies

select a.id ,a.copies,a.arrive_copies as arriveCopies,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.title,a.picture,a.contain_people as containPeople,a.preferential_price as preferentialPrice,a.original_price as originalPrice,a.address , e.name as enterpriceName from activity a left join category c on a.category=c.id left join enterprise e on a.enterprise_id = e.id where 1=1 and c.name=#{name} and a.state=1 and a.activity_time >now() and a.copies != a.arrive_copies
limit #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}

select count(*) from activity a left join category c on a.category=c.id left join enterprise e on a.enterprise_id = e.id where 1=1 and c.name=#{name} and a.state=1 and a.activity_time >now() and a.copies != a.arrive_copies
select * from activity where 1=1 and state=1 and arrive_time <= #{t,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.update:
update activity set activity_time = DATE_ADD(activity_time,INTERVAL 7 DAY), arrive_time = DATE_ADD(arrive_time,INTERVAL 7 DAY), arrive_copies = 0
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
